title: Hotelier Ian Schrager Confident of Return to Normal
itunes:title: Hotelier Ian Schrager Confident of Return to Normal
description:
Ian Schrager, Founder and Chairman of the Ian Schrager Company, discusses his realistic outlook for the hospitality and leisure industry post Covid-19. He also explains why his Times Square Edition hotel in Manhattan is slated to close permanently in August.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
